question: I normally menstruate for 10 days every month.i needed to know if it is permissable to take medication to stop my menstruation for the month of ramadaan,as I miss too many fast
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is not advisable to take medication to stop the menstruation without a pressing need, as that is harmful to health. However, if you take the medication and fast, your fasts will obviously be valid.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
